title: [Brewery, Burlitok's Showcase]
description: Innumerable shelves full of flagons, steins, mugs and glasses of every possible description ring the room, ascending from floor to vaulted ceiling in a mezmerizing myriad of shape and color.  The sweet acrid smell of cooking ale twinges your nose, coaxing you seductively from your trance and beckoning you further into the building.
